name: horse (keychain)
sizes_available: the height of the toy is 9 cm.
notes:
format: pdf file.

the pattern is available in english (us terms) and russian

all you will need for crocheting:
yarn art jeans (55% cotton, 45% acrylic)
hook 1.5

the size of the toy depends on the crochet density and the yarn thickness. please consider it if you choose another type of yarn.
you can use any other yarn, but then choose an appropriate size of a crochet hook.

i hope you liked my master class, and everything was clear.
please feel free to contact me if necessary.
thank you very much!
